item.description:
Dinner & Drinks before the Together Dance at the Castleton

Monday Dec. 31st. 5 pm. to 7:30 pm.

The Common Man Restaurant

88 Range rd. off of rt. 111, at the rt. 93 exit 3. Windham, NH. 03087

http://www.allmenus.com/nh/windham/32344-the-common-man-restaurant/menu/

Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962Â  ob@tds.net

RSVP ARE INCORRECT. THIS EVENT IS POSTED WITH UP TEN OTHER GROUPS.

Please join Steve Ob1. and friends for dinner and or drinks before the Dance. We plan to be there at 5 pm. to get seats and tables. The Common Man does not take reservations. So, what people we have at 5 pm. will be the seats we have. But, if you are late. We will have you join us and make room for you. Steve Ob1. will be there for dinner and to introducing everyone. After dinner, less than a mile away, we will head over to the Castleton for the Dance.

Food can not be taken in to the Castleton. State laws do not allow people to bring food in to the Castleton from the out side. But, if they don't see it come in? They will not say anything.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & Drinks Before the Dance.
